name: MESSENGNR
description:
MESSENGNR

[LUDUM DARE PAGE]

Space to do stuff mostly

X to read messages (don't)

C to close messages (do)

I didn't have time to finish, but this is what I got to. Works mostly, if you get stuck or the screen turns black press R. Sorry.

This is a game for Ludum Dare 30 aka #LD48. Enjoy! Or don't
